ViewObject.Name: OD_MyProjectPortfolioVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT 1 ROW_NUMBER , MAX(PPA.PROJECT_ID) , MAX(PPA.NAME) PROJ_NAME , MAX(PPA.SEGMENT1) PROJ_NUMBER , MAX(PPA.PROJECT_TYPE) PROJECT_TYPE , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 1, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_1 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 2, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_2 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 3, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_3 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 4, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_4 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 5, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_5 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 6, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_6 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 7, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_7 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 8, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_8 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 9, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_9 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,10, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_10 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,11, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_11 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,12, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_12 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,13, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_13 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,14, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_14 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,15, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_15 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,16, PT.TASK_NAME, NULL)) TASK_16 From Pa_Projects_All Ppa, Pa_Tasks Pt, Pa_Proj_Elements Ppe, Pa_Project_Statuses Pps, Pa_Proj_Elem_Ver_Schedule Ppvs, Pa_Projects_Erp_Ext_B Ppeb, Ego_Attr_Groups_V Eag, Fnd_Application fa Where Ppa.Project_Id = Pt.Project_Id And Pt.Task_Id = Ppe.Proj_Element_Id And Ppe.Status_Code = Pps.Project_Status_Code and pps.status_type = 'TASK' -- Comment not showing records after comp/uncompAND pps.project_status_name = 'Not Started' and ppe.object_type='PA_TASKS' and ppa.attribute_category = 'Private Brand' AND nvl(ppa.attribute10,'No') = 'Yes' AND ppa.enabled_flag = 'Y' and ppa.template_flag = 'N' And Pt.Task_Id = Ppvs.Proj_Element_Id and pt.project_id = ppvs.project_id and ppeb.attr_group_id = eag.attr_group_id and eag.attr_group_name = 'PB_GEN_INFO' and eag.application_id = fa.application_id AND FA.APPLICATION_SHORT_NAME = 'PA' AND PPEB.PROJECT_ID = PPA.PROJECT_ID AND PPA.PROJECT_TYPE = 'DI_PB_PROJECT' AND PPA.PROJECT_ID = 110210 UNION SELECT 2 ROW_NUMBER , MAX(PPA.PROJECT_ID) , MAX(PPA.NAME) PROJ_NAME , MAX(PPA.SEGMENT1) PROJ_NUMBER , MAX(PPA.PROJECT_TYPE) PROJECT_TYPE , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 1, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_1 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 2, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_2 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 3, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_3 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 4, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_4 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 5, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_5 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 6, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_6 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 7, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_7 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 8, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_8 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER, 9, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_9 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,10, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_10 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,11, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_11 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,12, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_12 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,13, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_13 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,14, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_14 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,15, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_15 , MAX(DECODE (PT.TASK_NUMBER,16, TO_CHAR(PPVS.SCHEDULED_FINISH_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), NULL)) TASK_16 From Pa_Projects_All Ppa, Pa_Tasks Pt, Pa_Proj_Elements Ppe, Pa_Project_Statuses Pps, Pa_Proj_Elem_Ver_Schedule Ppvs, Pa_Projects_Erp_Ext_B Ppeb, Ego_Attr_Groups_V Eag, Fnd_Application fa Where Ppa.Project_Id = Pt.Project_Id And Pt.Task_Id = Ppe.Proj_Element_Id And Ppe.Status_Code = Pps.Project_Status_Code and pps.status_type = 'TASK' -- Comment not showing records after comp/uncompAND pps.project_status_name = 'Not Started' and ppe.object_type='PA_TASKS' and ppa.attribute_category = 'Private Brand' AND nvl(ppa.attribute10,'No') = 'Yes' AND ppa.enabled_flag = 'Y' and ppa.template_flag = 'N' And Pt.Task_Id = Ppvs.Proj_Element_Id and pt.project_id = ppvs.project_id and ppeb.attr_group_id = eag.attr_group_id and eag.attr_group_name = 'PB_GEN_INFO' and eag.application_id = fa.application_id AND FA.APPLICATION_SHORT_NAME = 'PA' AND PPEB.PROJECT_ID = PPA.PROJECT_ID AND PPA.PROJECT_TYPE = 'DI_PB_PROJECT' AND PPA.PROJECT_ID = 110210
